CMS volleyball team battles Metcalfe County

span.span: Campbellsville Middle School volleyball team recently took on Metcalfe County.
Seventh- and eighth-graders picked up wins.

img.alt: CMS eighth-grader Ava Hughes mans the net.

a.title: Click to read more about: CMS volleyball team battles Metcalfe County

div.a: Read More about CMS volleyball team battles Metcalfe County

span.span: Campbellsville Elementary School preschool teachers recently visited their students and gave them a special Easter egg hunt.
Teachers recently rode on a school bus and drove by each students’ home.
When arriving, teachers tossed their students some Easter eggs filled with treats and waved hello.

img.alt: From left, CES preschool teacher Suzanna Streeval, assistant Lily Delgado, teacher Shannon Richardson and assistant Denise Wilder visit their students to bring them an Easter surprise.

a.title: Click to read more about: CES preschool teachers visit students
